title: Sycamore and Hudson’s Bay Prepare Kohl’s Bids
sub_head: Offers could value the department-store chain above $9 billion
body:
Private-equity firm Sycamore Partners and Canada’s Hudson’s Bay plan to submit takeover bids for Kohl’s Corp. that could value Kohl’s above $9 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.
The private-equity firm and the department-store chain plan to bid in the high $60s a share for Kohl’s, which asked suitors to submit offers by Wednesday, the people said. It couldn’t be learned whether other suitors plan to bid.
